title: Outbound visitor growth in Africa 2018 to 2022
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Year-over-year visitor growth. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
In general Year-over-year visitor growth has fallen over the Year.
Year-over-year visitor growth is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, roughly increasing from 2019 to 2021, and finally slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2022.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2020 and 2021.
The highest Year-over-year visitor growth, of value 6.1 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Year-over-year visitor growth about 3.3 was reached at Year 2020
